The best English language book on the Shinsengumi, by far, is Shinsengumi: =
The Shogun's Last Samurai Corps by Romulus Hillsborough. 

Don't use anythi=
ng you see in a Rurouni Kenshin cartoon, as entertaining as it might be. Al=
though there is some historical background, it isn't something you should b=
e using for factual information. A better film would be Gohatto (Taboo is t=
he English-release title) which is available at most larger video store cha=
ins. 

Hope that helps...

Jonathan P. Ellgen
